item.title: Trump is deploying 2,000 California National Guard troops over governor’s objections to LA to quell protests
item.description: DHS said in a statement that recent ICE operations in Los Angeles resulted in the arrest of 118 immigrants.

item.title: More Colorado Workplaces Are Becoming Safe Spaces for Employees in Recovery
item.description: Work can and should be a place of healing.

item.title: Why the Best Strategy for Business Success Is Doing Good
item.description: Prioritizing people and the planet, not just profits, is always good business.

item.title: How Leading With Integrity Drives Business Success in a ‘Win at All Costs’ Society
item.description: History proves that businesses with integrity can succeed. The key is to focus on purpose-driven work.

item.title: A hot trend in the housing market is Gen Z buying homes with siblings
item.description: BofA found that 22% of Gen Z homeowners bought their home with siblings, surging from 12% in 2024 and just 4% in 2023.
